item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: It's my birthday and Saturday morning so I'm catching up on some online reading and here's some interesting things I've found, in no particular order... Meg has a great experience with Apple's customer service. IT on $5/day is inline with the way we do IT on Recipezaar; inexpensive commodity hardware is a wonderful thing. Jason Kottke suggests an improvement to Mac OS X's Expos√© feature. I am still in love with OS X 10.3, but Tim O'Reilly has some criticisms of it and about the future of technology. A more realistic audio of Armstrong walking on the moon. (Warning: profanities ahead).
